Text: RE Georgetown Strategic Planning Cc I am out of the office Tues and Weds this week Original Message From Lebeau Paul Sent Friday August PM To Steffes James D Howe David Neuner Kirk Sparling Jay Cc Noske Linda J Herasimchuk Alyse Subject RE Georgetown Strategic Planning I have heard from everybody but David Howe Both Jay and Kirk can do Wednesday AM As soon as I hear from David Howe I will let everyone know Thanks Paul L Original Message From Lebeau Paul Sent Friday August PM To Steffes James D Howe David Neuner Kirk Sparling Jay Cc Noske Linda J Herasimchuk Alyse Subject RE Georgetown Strategic Planning Hello Again Jim Steffes is able to meet next week Tuesday or Wednesday Aug or in the AM Please let me know if one of these days will work Thanks Paul L Original Message From Lebeau Paul Sent Thursday August AM To Steffes James D Howe David Neuner Kirk Sparling Jay Subject Georgetown Strategic Planning Hello Gentlemen I have attached the Georgetown Recruiting Schedule Not all of the items have been set there is room for change We will need to set aside some time for the five of us to sit down and discuss our recruiting efforts Please let me know what your schedule looks like next week for a meeting Upcoming events Careers Extrav Sept th Bill W Brown VP EIM sitting on Panel David Howe Jay Sparling Paul LeBeau Finance Day Sept th Chip Schneider VP in Risk Analytics Case Study at Lunch Jeff Soo Manager in Risk Analytic Case Study at Lunch Ray Bowen Possible Panelist David Howe working on this Paul LeBeau Presentation Jim Steffes Tentative Presentor Team members AJ Brancaccio Enron Summer Intern Pres of Finance Day mentioned to me on the phone yesterday that the other panelist were manger or rd year Assoc He had suggested that someone like Jay Sparling or Kirk Neuner could be panelist Something to talk about File Geoergetowntemplatefallbxls I am also sending out a team email for Presentation and Interviews It will go out today or Friday Thanks Paul L
